Attributes.description: Legal, environmental and physicochemical aspects of industrial water pollution and its abatement will be surveyed; techniques for design of wastewater treatment processes currently used in industry; case studies from chemical and process industries will be considered in detail.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of CHBE 251, CIVL 215, MECH 280, MTRL 263.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Wed, Start Time: 16:00, End Time: 18:00, Building: Forest, Room: Sciences
